about_the_game:
The soundtrack to Blues and Bullets is a collection of exciting and captivating tracks that will transport you to the dark and mysterious corners of Santa Esperanza.

All the tracks are in mp3 format

  • Blues And Bullets ft Izä
  • Main Theme
  • Investigation
  • Capone’s Mansion
  • O.B.
  • The Guest
  • Delphine
  • Nikolai Ivankov
  • Submarine
  • Chapel
  • Reconstruction
  • Blues And Bullets Intimate (Jukebox)
  • Lost Children
  • The Diner
  • Garrison, O’Reilly, Di Pietro, Dockers
  • Entrance Cleared
  • Capone
  • Meeting Delphine
  • Submarine Emersion
  • Confess your sins

The tracks will be stored in your Blues and Bullets folder in the Steam directory:
..\Steam\steamapps\common\Blues and Bullets
